_comment: Created by ianb on 08/10/2013 13:47:49 using v0.9
title: How has the number of staff feeling pressured to work when unwell changed by sector?
analysis_commentary: Ambulance trust staff consistently reported feeling more pressure to attend work when feeling unwell in the previous three months when compared to acute, mental health and learning disabilities, and community trusts.
data_source: Department of Health, Survey of NHS staff
